amendment.description: Amendment reduces the funding for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management by $600,000 and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funding for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management by $600,000 and deposit the same amount to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
